item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice News Reader (Level 1)
item.description: Showed logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 2)
item.description: Looked for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 1)
item.description: Looked for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 1)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Looked for change that introduce or remove a string with git log -S

item.title: Stamp Collector
item.description: Investigated old branches by using git reflog --date=relative

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 2)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 2)
item.description: Removed untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Historian (Level 6)
item.description: Investigated the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 1)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 5)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Author (Level 6)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Socialite (Level 4)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 2)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Presenter (Level 4)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 1)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Seamstress (Level 4)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 3)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 1)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.
